name: Tower Defence Like Game in 8 hours 40 minutes
name_original: Tower Defence Like Game in 8 hours 40 minutes
description:
Was going to do it in 10 hours but got bored.

this is not a complete game. I was testing what I could do in a short time.

BTW PRESS ESC IF YOU WANT TO CLOSE THE INFO (WHERE IT SHOWS YOUR UNITS DAMAGE, NAME etc)

There may be bugs and un finished mechanics. Since I got bored and stopped

Background music:
